_comment: VERSIONING RULES: Bot V.DDMM.HOTFIX[TYPE]-YY | TYPE: a (Alpha) > b (Beta) > s (Stable). HOTFIX: 1.0.0 or more progressive.

history.logs: AudioPlayer Overhaul: Implemented 'Smart Previous' (restarts song if >5s or finished), fixed TikTok/local file seeking bug, and enabled persistent UI messages (embed only replaced on new tracks). Maintenance & Safety: Added universal exit listener for download cleanup (handles kicks/timeouts), enhanced 'reset_bot.py' with directory structure recreation, and fully rebranded music cog to 'AudioPlayer'.
